title: Status freezes on splash screen (iOS)
body:
[comment]: # (Please replace ... with your information. Remove < and >)

### User Story

As a user, I want to launch the application on an iOS device.

### Description

Type: bug
I downloaded, built and launched everything as instructed in the wiki. When building the app on Xcode (be it simulator or actual device) the app hangs on the splash screen and doesn't do anything. In the Xcode console I can see the following log (see logs at the bottom)

#### Expected behavior
The app should launch

#### Actual behavior
The app just hangs on the splash screen with the Status logo

### Reproduction
1. Install the app as per the wiki instructions
2. Build and run on Xcode
3. The app shows the splash but doesn't go past there, check the console log.

### Solution


### Additional Information
iOS 11.2
Xcode Version 9.1

#### Logs

```
2017-12-10 10:07:10.361 [info][tid:main][RCTBatchedBridge.m:75] Initializing <RCTBatchedBridge: 0x6000001b8800> (parent: <RCTBridge: 0x6040002c0620>, executor: RCTJSCExecutor)
```

The last 2 lines get repeated ad infinitum until I quit the app.
@pabloruiz55 I had the same problem. See #2678 for a workaround
Duplicate of #2678 - please try removing the directory, cloning again and running `./scripts/setup-osx` instead and let me know how it goes.
